fields.title: India Women vs South Africa Women
fields.description: The Indian Women take on South Africa in an electrifying ODI World Cup encounter at Wankhede. Expect big crowds, big hits, and world-class cricket!

fields.title: India Women vs Australia Women
fields.description: A thrilling Women's ODI World Cup fixture as India faces the defending champions Australia under the lights of DY Patil Stadium.

fields.title: Australia Women vs England Women
fields.description: The legendary Ashes rivalry continues in the Women's ODI World Cup. Australia and England clash in a high-intensity group stage match at the MCG.

fields.title: Australia Women vs South Africa Women
fields.description: Australia faces South Africa in a crucial World Cup group stage match at the Sydney Cricket Ground. Expect tight bowling and tactical brilliance.

fields.title: India Women vs Bangladesh Women
fields.description: A subcontinental battle full of passion and skill as India takes on Bangladesh Women at the iconic Eden Gardens.

fields.title: India Women vs New Zealand Women
fields.description: A key clash between two top teams — India and New Zealand Women — in front of a massive crowd at the Narendra Modi Stadium.

fields.title: Sri Lanka Women vs Bangladesh Women
fields.description: An exciting all-Asian contest as Sri Lanka and Bangladesh Women face off in a crucial World Cup group stage match at R. Premadasa Stadium.
